chapter.title: General commands
chapter.para: Outlined in this chapter are general commands for interacting with the Forge runtime, your projects and the workspace.

section.title: Opening a file or folder
section.para: The command open allows you to open a file or folder.
The format of the command is:

Using the command to open a file will open it in an editor. Executing the command on a folder in your workspace will expanded the folder in the Project Explorer view. If the resource is a folder outside the workspace it will be selected and expanded in the Remote Systems view.

textobject.phrase: Having executed the command on a file, it is opened in its respective editor.
